__TOC__

Katapult is an item launcher for KDE, similar to Quicksilver of MacOS X. This page is used by Kubuntu developers, who want to keep this project alive.

<nowiki>[[https://developer.berlios.de/projects/kubuntupult/|Project page]]</nowiki>

== Features requests ==
<nowiki>[[https://developer.berlios.de/feature/?group_id=4243|Feature Requests on berlios ]]</nowiki>

* KAddressbook plugin to search the contacts (send e-mail to..., show details for...)
* Use Kimproxy to search contacts in kopete/konversation (start chat with...) 
* spellchecker (type in spell:foo and is reports if it's the correct spelling or no)
* dictionary and thesaurus (type dict:foo and it gives you definitions like ''dict'' command)
* web shortcuts (import from konqueror? this could replace spell: and dict:)
* protocols (support protocols from konqueror, e.g. ftp:/ftp.blah.com launches konqueror with this URL.)
* Konqueror history

Other ideas to pilfer: http://quicksilver.blacktree.com/plugins.php

== Bugs to correct ==
<nowiki>[[https://developer.berlios.de/bugs/?group_id=4243|Bugs on Berlios]]</nowiki>
* Problem with query of an existing application which is not in the catalog (eg: ls, chmod)
* Don't scale up icons
* Improve usability of the document plugin
* Require enter key being pressed before launching an application.
